name: aws-serverless-express-example
description: Example application for running a Node Express app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name AwsServerlessExpressFunction --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.delete-bucket: aws s3 rm s3://YOUR_UNIQUE_BUCKET_NAME/lambda-function.zip; aws s3 rm s3://YOUR_UNIQUE_BUCKET_NAME/simple-proxy-api.yaml; aws s3 rb s3://YOUR_UNIQUE_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name AwsServerlessExpressStack --template-body file://./cloudformation.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=AwsServerlessExpressS3Bucket,ParameterValue=YOUR_UNIQUE_BUCKET_NAME && open https://console.aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/home?region=us-east-1#/stacks?filter=active
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name AwsServerlessExpressStack --template-body file://./cloudformation.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=AwsServerlessExpressS3Bucket,ParameterValue=YOUR_UNIQUE_BUCKET_NAME
scripts.package-upload-function: npm run package-function && npm run upload-lambda-function-package
scripts.package-upload-update-function: npm run package-upload-function && npm run update-function
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run create-bucket && npm run package-upload-function && npm run upload-api-gateway-swagger && npm run create-stack
